GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: delete the comment of specified id

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves up a json representation of the specified review

review.title: Culture a Love of Agriculture With Agricola
review.review_body: You could sum up Agricola with the simple phrase 'Farmyeard Fun' but the mechanics and game play add so much more than that. You'll find yourself torn between breeding pigs, or sowing crops. Its joyeous and rewarding and it makes you think of time spent outside, which is much harder to do these days!

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: accepts a json object `{inc_votes: num}` and increase/decrease the `votes` property of specified review. responds with the updated review

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves up an array of comments associated with specified review_id

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: accepts a json object with property `username` and `body` and saves it as a new comment in database.

GET /api/users.description: serves up an array of available usernames

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves up a json representation of user data associated with given username
